properties.entry: INSERT INTO MG_MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_PNO, MEMBER_GENDER , EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, SUB_PHONE) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptPwd() */ A.MEMBER_PWD FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PNO , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.SUB_PHONE , A.MEMBER_POINT , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.CHECK_BLACKLIST , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NAME = ? AND A.PHONE = ?
SELECT A.MEMBER_NAME FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_PWD FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ? AND A.MEMBER_NAME= ? AND A.PHONE = ? AND A.EMAIL = ?
UPDATE MG_MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE A.PHONE = ?
UPDATE MG_MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MG_MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_NAME=? , A.PHONE= ? , A.EMAIL = ? , A.ADDRESS = ? WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MG_MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PNO , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.SUB_PHONE , A.MEMBER_POINT , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.CHECK_BLACKLIST , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO MG_ORDER A ( A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT SEQ_ORDER_NO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MG_ORDER_GOODS A ( A.ORDER_NO , A.GOODS_NO , A.AMOUNT_COUNT , A.ORDER_GOODS_PRICE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A ( A.DELIVERY_NO , A.ORDER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_DELI_NO.NEXTVAL , ? )
SELECT SEQ_ORDER_DELI_NO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO MG_ORDER_ADDRESS A ( A.ORDER_ADD_NO , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.ORDER_ADD_TYPE , A.RECIEVER_NAME , A.RECIEVER_PHONE , A.RECIEVER_ADDRESS , A.MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_ADD_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO MG_PAYMENT A ( A.PAYMENT_NO , A.PAYMENT_ORDER_NO , A.PAYMENT_MEMBER_NO , A.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE , A.USED_POINT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PAYMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT SEQ_PAYMENT_NO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MG_PAYMENT_DIVISION A ( A.DIVISION_NO , A.DIVISION_PAYMENT_NO , A.ADMISSION_PAYMENT_NUM ) VALUES ( SEQ_DIVISION_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO MG_MEMBER_POINT A ( A.POINT_NO , A.CHANGED_POINT_TYPE , A.PAYMENT_NO , A.MODIFY_POINT , A.MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_POINT_NO.NEXTVAL , '사용' , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MG_MEMBER M SET M.MEMBER_POINT = ? , M.MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MG_MEMBER_MODIFY A ( A.MODIFY_NO , A.ORIGIN_COLUMN , A.ORIGIN_INFO , A.MODIFY_INFO , A.MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_MODIFY_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
